content: Awesome application for history fans
The new update is amazing. My only request is to add more events/historical figures and most importantly a dark mode. Thank you
replyContent: Thanks a lot for the 5 stars. Textviewer has a darkmode available in the settings. The newest content update from 07.Feb.2021 contains lot more (smaller) events. Example: Search for 'covid' and you get a timeline about covid. Please restart the app and you will be asked to update the content.

content: Muy sencilla de usar y con muy buena información. Vale la pena comprarla.
Very slow, some controls do not work, even on a current flagship phone.
Great App, keep the good job and i hope the events marked as "This event isn't available in your language" or something like that gets solved, at least in English.
great source of knowledge and historical data. handy UI and navigation. thumb up to the dev.

As a lover of history I like watching the map of the world across the ages, being able to see the world in any particular year I want is great. I will give this app 5 stars when the Bronze Age States, Tribes, and People are all included and in a more accurate form.
Wonderful App...my go to for research..if you are a lover of history and geography this is a must have...PLEASE keep up the good work!!

I'm throughly impressed. I don't get to say this very often about any apps in the beginning. Visually pleasing with a wealth of information. My true academic loves are the maths, and sciences, but I've read a lot of history books as well. Keep your work here true, and you will have a fan for life.
I'm a paid member and my data update is not working anymore. There's no update button in the update page. I see only the cancel button. Now, I can't even use the app anymore.
Absolutely awesome! Let me know if you create new apps; I'm sure they'll be awesome also! I'm so impressed!
Thanks dev it's fix now..5 star for your team!
replyContent: Dear Vin. Sorry you are right. There is a problem with countries, empires, expedition routes and so on. I just fixed this now. At the next start you will be asked to update the content. Kind regards.

content: Good app, but nation descriptions aren't showing up
replyContent: Thanks for reporting this issue. I just fixed this. At the next start you will be asked to update the content.

content: Imeionlinehumanmalexygene©®™ DataBases CCSLGN DTA IVC ZAsia Icc.inAsiaWorldMap SubmittingPhonesDataLocationOnline ®©™αAtlasMapping BCADsolvappsaddeddatasent
i like history
Fun to browse through the timeline. I play a lot of historical games like eu4 and total war games so im always interested in learning history.

One of the coolest, most informative, and beautiful apps out there! Already spent hours just exploring the history timelines....and delving deeper into details wherever I like. Well done to the devs on this one! It's gem!
The app is amazing, perfect as a reference or study tool.

Best history atlas app out there, BUT.. this app really lacks the names of cities, regions, areas etc. And also more zoom is needed. If those are added as well it will be perfect. Edit: It also needs more content especially in antiquity: India, Central Asia etc. are all completely empty in B.C. dates.

Pretty disappointed tbh, bought the app, go to Australia, scroll to 1788... Nothing... Is this only Europe and America? Also, can't visually scroll in the bottom large area of the list, would visually scroll through time much better than simply choosing a year from the date picker. Lastly, performance could be optimised, sluggish even on a high end device. As someone that was never into history this looked like a great way to get into it.

Super helpful for school as it organizes everything into one place. Atlas also helps contextualize what's going on around the world at any given moment. Only suggestion would be to give the ability to lock a year as accidental scrolling can occur.
Excelent
Great

This app is unbelievable! Well worth whatever I paid for it. It's the most original, creative and concise app I've ever seen. If you're wanting knowledge for school or just brush up on some history, this is definitely the app to have! Thanks for making this devs, it's a masterpiece!
Very good app
Have downloaded data for paid app several times. Failed no data downloaded rather disappointed. Can you help?
replyContent: Please contact me for support or for refund : solvapps@gmail.com.

content: This is the absolute best history source I could find on the app store. I have been looking for a concrete way to see how the world shaped over any time period, and this app delivers. 10/10
Informative and authoritative.
Greatest history tool, I have ever used. Any chance of seeing a desktop version?
Excellent. But... Confused. What's the other non trial world history app then? Is this atlas one all I need?
This atlas is really one of the best history sources I have ever been through. Its a great source for whoever interested in history. Thanks so much.
Does not work.
What a fantastic app. I was expecting to get an historical atlas but this is so much more detailed and interesting. Well worth the money.

The app's gotten so much better with the recent update. There should be an option to move the quick text around the screen, though. Also, when I move the map around a little, some events just disappear, till I move the map to a certain position. This never happened BEFORE the update. Could you look into it please dev? Overall, an amazing history app, I love it.
Incredible app. The amount of historical information is enormous. A must for everyone.
the best app on history..so comprehensive and regularly updated. great money's worth. thanks!
pretty cool but the information is just copy pasted form wikipedia.
new post: i dont know why but i cant download. edit: nevermind.
I love this app but recently it takes forever to load a page
Best app on the store. Worth every penny
replyContent: Wow! Thank you so much. Kind regards.

content: Great app always using it for references easy to use and read

Incredible how many topics it includes. The map where you can see the 
empires that ruled during a specific time is Awesome
Kinda slow but very useful
The map is very detail and easy to use.
quality app, well worth downloading.
Wonderful app, been using it for quite a long time. Hope it gets updated soon!
Excellent-I never enjoyed History at school but I now think that this application is one of the best and most interesting that I have ever bought.

This app is great.  I love being able to read from one era to the next interchangeably. There seems to be many spelling and grammar mistakes.  I think this app was translated to English so that may be why. I think navigation through the app could use some work.
Very thorough easy navigable history app.. thank you
replyContent: Thanks a lot. I remember you had problems in mar. 2016 and still you are using the app. I am very happy. Still working on it. Thanks.

content: Superior! Presentation makes understanding individual events in the context of the world at that time much easier than any other format I have seen.  Smooth operation, clear language, applicable tools, and relevant imagery make this app a must for anyone interested in what has gone before. Ten star app.
Awesome offline history app. No such app can match this for at least 4 to 5 years.

This app has great potential. I really like the atlas. All the data can be used offline which is a big plus. You can immerse yourself in it for hours. The UI can be hard to use from time to time though.  Some suggestions to the author: 1. The timeline is a bit hard to use as the events seem to be grouped arbitrarily. It will be nice if they can be grouped with geographical proximity.  2. Once selected an event on timeline, I wish I could drag it to the middle of the screen so that I can center the timeline around it. 3. I am not an native English speaker. So some of the names are not familiar to me. I wish there is a link to wikipedia as I can choose language there. 4. Once selecting a period, I wish I could touch the starting/ending year to quickly jump to that year. 5. Jumping through years is not easy. Maybe pressing and holding on the timeline to select a year. 6. The labels on map are colliding with each other.
replyContent:
Thanks a lot for your suggestions. Interesting, I guess clicking on an event and centering is a very good idea and will be implemented soon.
Other suggestions will also go on the wishlist.
thanks a lot and kind regards

content: This app would be a 5 star one if it didn't fail to add the maps for the ancient  civilizations of Dacia, Scythia and Sarmatia. Maybe on later releases ? A good game otherwise, I highly recommend it. Maybe the devs can add in an expansion for Antiquity with more detail on older history, such as neolithic and bronze age cultures. But yeah guys, add in the early Indo-Iranian tribes of antiquity in, as well as Dacia.
replyContent:
Apps content is just updated with neolithic revolution and with actual events.
kind regards

content: Really fascinating to scrub through the human history timeline and watch the ebb and flow of civilizations

No other applications to compare with so I can't give a comparative review except for experience in using this.... I sometimes confuse I and L with some entries that I'm not familiar with..  perhaps using other font will be a solution... some entries are not clear.. it says you can check below but it's nowhere to be found or look at the picture at the right but no picture... entries in bold font are not linked.. perhaps making a link will be great... using search is not comprehensive together with look word

When trying to install it on a new device (tab 2), it takes forever to download the additional content (my WiFi is fine). Then when it is finally done I get the same message that it has to download the external data again... tried several times with same result. Real bummer, I liked it a lot.

I am am amateur historian and use this app constantly for reference. Most apps are simply time lines, this is far superior. Providing references by geography and time. The ability to view world maps of empires and events year by year is amazing. A superb app folks!
This app is what i was looking for. It does have a little hiccups, but its mainly due to my slow phone.
Relies on another app that will not download and install correctly
replyContent: Please contact solvapps@gmail.com for support. It will work.

content: Can you guys make this available on the Kindle so I can teach my son about history? I don't mind buying it again. Atlas and Chronica.
replyContent: Thank you very much. We'll have to check how to publish the app for a kindle version.

content: Well, I couldn't ask for more. App done with passion for history. Everything in one place and offline. Asko for twice and I will pay for it.

Superb and Highly Informative. Interface is top notch and more importantly Encyclopedic Information is biased free. Very accurate representation on events and extremely well thought design.  Almost impossible for anyone to make a comparable application without copying interface from this app. Well Done.  Just mention the source of information/data in this application.  Work flawlessly on my Samsung Galaxy Note 4 without any single crash ever.
Uses over 2 GB ROM, best value app on g.play. absolutely brilliant app.
A time travel jorney
very usefull and must have application for anyone who is interested in world history. It worth your every penny...

This is perfect for any history geek. Love the fact that it runs very smooth offline. The map in conjunction with the initiative and well integrated timeline controls make this one of the best apps on my tablet.

App is great , well worth the money. I was afraid that i t wasn't going to be updated , but at last after 9 months it is. My only wish is more frequent updates with more content. 5 stars I hope it doesn't get abandoned.

A copy from my review of the main app. Fascinating , exactly what I was looking for. I love that the data is in the app. I tried another app and it just linked you out to Wikipedia. This is just such a more fluid and robust experience with multiple ways to navigate and view data. Along with the atlas extension this is a tremendous application and an impressive achievement.
This app is the best app if u r a history lover but some events r not there like haryanka dynasty nd many others so kindly get me a update for this
There are too many events missing.
Perfect app! Huge amount of info for a small price.

I love history and this app is the most interesting app on my phone. The map is an add-on to the 'Chronica' World History app. You can pick a date and the time line shows all of the recorded events at that time, click on the event and it opens up a beautifully written account. Provides hours and hours of fascinating reading. It is literally an encyclopedia on your phone (with the map providing further fascinating information on the events your reading about) Thank you to the developers who have created it.
Pity it hasn't installed itself on my up to date Android tablet. I would like a refund but it seems I asked at the wrong time....
replyContent: Please contact me with email to solvapps@gmail.com for support or refund. I do not understand "I asked at the wrong time". You never asked me for a refund and with this comment I do not have any chance to relate this to an order. kind regards, Andreas

content: More like a trivia app... Lots of events on a timeline and looks cluttered... Water mark of the Year in the middle of the map is distracting... The year is already listed at the top so the Watermark is not needed ... Invited to send questions via the contact button but I never got a reply... Ok for a secondary atlas but is not my go to app at all... It is not bad but I was disappointed because I had hoped for something more readable...
replyContent: Problably I allow to hide the Water mark in the options ? I just checked the emails and I never got an email from you (John Patrick Lewis). You can contact me with solvapps@gmail.com directly if you like. kind regards.

content: I recommend this app to everyone who likes history. Very promising.  I am amazed how well written and complete it is. You have history from the beginning of the civilizations to the current time; general and isolated facts. Moreover, the map really helps you situate facts in space and time.   I would only criticise that the app needs to run more smoothly, 'cause sometimes it lags. And also that the date tool should not be over map or timeline as it is very helpful to watch changes over time.
Awesome

Been using this app a while now and having never really reviewed an app before I felt I needed to for this.  You have done an outstanding job.  Together with the atlas feature I can't say enough good things.  The actual content is from Wikipedia but that's just fine.  Being able to switch to the map view (if atlas is installed) makes it perfect.  I've tried a few history apps on here but this is really all you need.  Well worth the price!  You've made this history nerd very happy.
Fantastično
This app will use a lot of space, over 1 gigabyte. So do not buy unless you have the space. Otherwise best history app on the playstore.
Not for Android Very slow
replyContent:
Dear Carl
Could you please tell us (solvapps@gmail.com) what part is slow ? Is it the initial download, which will take time. Or is it any view on your device ? Did you try stopping background processes ? 
kind regards
Andreas

content: Стоит своих денег однозначно
Anyone interested in history! Would have paid a lot more for such an awesome app
Incredible.  Map view a plus!
Loved the original and this update is well worth the wait. I do think that long time supporters should have gotten a discount on the update but otherwise very happy
Love it
